alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 10:21PM CDT until July 29 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR PUTNAM AND SOUTHERN BUREAU COUNTIES... At 1020 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Coal Hollow to Wyoming, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Hennepin, Spring Valley, Henry, DePue, Granville, Wyanet, Sheffield, Tiskilwa, Dalzell, Buda, Bureau Junction, McNabb, Putnam, Mark, Neponset, Seatonville, Magnolia, Mineral and Standard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
